actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to provide for the accelerated repayment of the Grand Valley Project, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for the repayment of the Grand Valley Reclamation Project (Colorado) through the sale or development of power or power privileges. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior, upon final payment, to convey all U.S. interest in such Project to the Grand Valley Water Users Association and/or the Orchard Mesa Irrigation District, or their successors.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the accelerated repayment of the Grand Valley Project, and for other purposes.
